Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Curly \Curl"y\ (k?rl"?), a. Curling or tending to curl; having curls; full of ripples; crinkled. [1913 Webster]
curly adj : (of hair) having curls or waves; "they envied her naturally curly hair" [ant: {straight}] [also: {curliest}, {curlier}]
